TopicTitle: Showing us all the new things in a cooler way?

Articles.Content: At the bottom of this link: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/misc.php?do=bbcode](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/misc.php?do=bbcode) There is an embedable feature called "Sketchfab" that shows 3d models. It seems pretty neat and I was wondering why I've never seen it used on the forums. Maybe it could be used to display new or work-in-progress parts, or maybe the new femkerbals?
I've seen it used a few times, mostly by WIP part makers.

Like this?

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

or this?

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-21T17:41:02Z" title="02/21/2015 05:41  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 21, 2015</time> by SaturnV**

Yeah, I've seen it used a couple of times.

> 
> Like this?

That bottom picture with the space station looks so scary with no sun... or planet... or anything...

I'd use it loads if there was a '.craft to sketchfab' tool on the forum (which was easy to use)

Every craft I upload would have it in the OP...

> 
> That bottom picture with the space station looks so scary with no sun... or planet... or anything...

What, you've never accidentally flung a stage and six kerbals completely out of the system at a significant percentage of lightspeed?

You mean like this?

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

[Saturbo V Model](https://sketchfab.com/models/ff38e836092f476fb1e86714f470a32c) by [gusturbo](https://sketchfab.com/gusturbo) on [Sketchfab](https://sketchfab.com)

Only people I've seen use it are modders, outside of Squad showing off that the forum can embed it.

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
I would really like to display my crafts with this, but it seems like a lot of 3D converting to make it work with colours and such.

> 
> I would really like to display my crafts with this, but it seems like a lot of 3D converting to make it work with colours and such.

It is a bit of a pain to get textures to work. More on what I used here:

[http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2qfye6/wip_ksp_in_blender/](http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2qfye6/wip_ksp_in_blender/)

> 
> I'd use it loads if there was a '.craft to sketchfab' tool on the forum (which was easy to use)
> Every craft I upload would have it in the OP...

If there was a simple programmatic way, then I'd build it into KerbalX.com so every craft on there would have one, that would be amazing! We'd need a service that could load every single mod and stock part in existence into blender though, so....problematic!
